description: Assesses introductory compare and contrast writing

levels.4: Clearly identifies at least 2 meaningful similarities between the two things
levels.2: Attempts a similarity but it's vague or not meaningful

feedback_stems.growth: Look for ways the two things are the same—what do they have in common?

levels.4: Clearly identifies at least 2 meaningful differences between the two things
levels.2: Attempts a difference but it's vague or not meaningful

feedback_stems.growth: Look for ways the two things are different—what makes each one special?

levels.4: Uses comparison words (both, also, similarly) and contrast words (but, however, unlike)
levels.3: Uses some comparison or contrast words
levels.2: Few signal words; reader has to guess if you're comparing or contrasting

feedback_stems.strength: You used great signal words like
feedback_stems.growth: Use words like 'both,' 'but,' and 'unlike' to show comparisons and contrasts
